𓂠 ma… ≈ 𓂟 manu manual

𓂠 ⋍ 𓅓 M :
𓂠 𓏏 𓁐 mother

𒄠𒈠𒌅 am-ma-tu /ammatu/ arm forearm ⇔ armature 𒄠 manu
𒄠𒈠𒌅 ᵗam-ma-tu ⇔ IDUM 𓂞 𒁕

𓅓 𓂟 , 𓅓 𓂝 መኑ mannu “who” 𒌋𒌋𒉡 man-nu who?
𓅓 𓂟 , 𓅓 𓂝 ምንት mənt “what” ምን min

𓂜 ⲘⲘⲞⲚ manu mḗ mò 𐀃𐀄 ≈ 𒀀𒀀 a/mû/a μή mḗ 没 mò méi 𓂜 ( 𐀃 𐀄 home/hammer) 没 meí ≈ 𒀀𓂜 (💧 mû + 𓂟 manu )

𓅓 𓂝 𓃭 𓏤 𓎡 𓄿 𓃀 𓏲 𓍘 𓇋 𓆱 | chariot | Cannanean: markabti Akkadian: narkabtu Coptic:
𓂠 𓂋 𓏤 𓎡 𓃀 𓏏 𓅱 | chariot | 𓌝 𓏏

𓂠 manu ≈ malû : fill , place

reach reichen

𓂠 ⋍ 𓂋𓂝 𓏌𓂝 reach, reich, carry 𓂋𓂞 𒂵 GA 又 YAD 𓂞 ⋍ 及 jí

empar port

𓂠 ⋍ 𓅓 •empar µport in

𓂝+𓏌 brachio 𓂠𓏏𓉐 port, partier, bear PIE superroot c.f. 𓅓?

𓂠 ⋍ 𓂠𓏏𓉐 (trans)port bare offer

𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓂠 󴤬 φέρετρον phéretron bier Bahre

𓎛𓆰𓈖𓎡𓇋𓇋𓏏𓂠𓉐 𓏥 bed @ night

𓂢 ḪND Hand => Henkel 𓎛𓈖𓎡𓏏𓏌𓂠𓏌𓏌 hinkel-tragen
